attributes.comment:
Regarding the proposal by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services), docket
number USCIS-2006- 0044 -- please reconsider raising these fees. It is hard
enough to "just adopt" as so many have recommended we do to build our family.
After so many losses, we are hoping to adopt over the next couple of years, but
the $20,000 - $50,000 cost related to adoption is daunting for any family.

Adoption is expensive enough already, and it is unconscionable to raise fees by
up to 66% for adoption-related petitions.

Please consider the orphans and the families that will be affected by these fees.

Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by G. Mattson
